caption:
This photograph captures a scenic, outdoor setup featuring two Volkswagen buses. The focus is on a red and white bus parked on a beach-like terrain. The red bus appears to be a vintage model, likely from the 1960s or 1970s, equipped with a pop-up camper roof that is extended upwards, indicating that the bus is set up for camping. The front of the bus faces the camera, showing its distinctive V-shaped front with the classic Volkswagen logo. It features a clean and polished exterior with shiny chrome details like bumpers and hubcaps.

Behind the red bus, there is another similarly styled Volkswagen bus, painted in a pale green or beige color. This second bus is further in the background, and its side is visible to the viewer. Both buses are parked on a rough, grassy surface with patches of sand, suggestive of a low-traffic beach or coastal area.

The background of the image shows a calm sea extending towards the horizon under a partly cloudy sky. The sky is filled with large, fluffy clouds that appear dynamic and add a sense of depth to the image. The overall setting is tranquil and leisurely, typical of a beach outing or a campsite by the sea. The picture evokes a sense of adventure and nostalgia, typical for travel and exploration themes associated with such vintage campervans.
title: Beach at little duck key.  Camping is popular throughout the keys, and many have large commercial facilities.  These do not yet exist at little duck, but camping and trailers are permitted
